questions.question: What is the dominant color of the device's exterior?
What is the primary visible port on the device's side?
What is the shape of the external device casing?
What appears to be the material of the device's body?
What is the text printed above the HDMI port?
What word is printed near the input port?
What kind of indicator light is visible on the device?
What is the overall visual texture of the device's surface?
What is the orientation of the labeling on the device?
What is the apparent size of the device, relative to a hand?
How many distinct ports are visibly present on the device?
What is the state of the visible indicator light?
What is the style of the text font used in the labeling?
Is the device's casing glossy or matte?
What is the apparent overall condition of the device?
